channel.title: Comments on: Povitica – Daring Bakers Challenge October 2011

item.title: By: Choc-affair
item.dc:creator: Choc-affair
item.description: tried this recipe last night and worked a treat, thanks for your great advice and photos as usual! all the best.
item.content:encoded: tried this recipe last night and worked a treat, thanks for your great advice and photos as usual! all the best.

item.title: By: Carol Anne
item.dc:creator: Carol Anne
item.description: Those swirls are just perfect, amazing job!
item.content:encoded: Those swirls are just perfect, amazing job!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I've never heard of it either, but it sure looks lovely when you rolled it up. I love that cinnamon/cocoa combination too.
item.content:encoded: I’ve never heard of it either, but it sure looks lovely when you rolled it up. I love that cinnamon/cocoa combination too.

item.title: By: Heather, Mmm... is for Mommy
item.dc:creator: Heather, Mmm... is for Mommy
item.description: Your povitica is beautiful :) Great job!
item.content:encoded: Your povitica is beautiful ðŸ™‚ Great job!

item.title: By: kouky
item.dc:creator: kouky
item.description: so beautiful and amaizing job!! I love your povitica !
item.content:encoded: so beautiful and amaizing job!! I love your povitica !

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: This bread looks so unassuming until it is cut open! Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: This bread looks so unassuming until it is cut open! Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Jo
item.dc:creator: Jo
item.description: Lovely povitica and granite! I have to say I am a bit jealous of that great space for rolling out doughs!
item.content:encoded: Lovely povitica and granite! I have to say I am a bit jealous of that great space for rolling out doughs!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Excellent work on this challenge! The two-spiral roll is quite unique, and both loaves are beautiful.
item.content:encoded: Excellent work on this challenge! The two-spiral roll is quite unique, and both loaves are beautiful.

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I've never heard of this sweet treat before. You've done a beautiful job! This reminds me of a cinnamon swirl.
item.content:encoded: I’ve never heard of this sweet treat before. You’ve done a beautiful job! This reminds me of a cinnamon swirl.

item.title: By: JM
item.dc:creator: JM
item.description: Very nice! Great color and 3-roll shape. I went with an egg wash myself for the top, but the milk wash brought out a gorgeous caramel glow in yours.
item.content:encoded: Very nice! Great color and 3-roll shape. I went with an egg wash myself for the top, but the milk wash brought out a gorgeous caramel glow in yours.
